title: cancalam tIrttiDuvAi
sahitya:
cancalam tIrttiDuvAi shivanE cancalam tIrttiDuvAi


anupallavi

  nenjilE shuddhAtma neruppinai Ukki vanjakap-pulangaLin mAyattai nIrAkki


caraNam 1    hInak-kavalai vazhi mAnam keTTalaindiDum edir varum poruLin merkkadumenap-pAindiDum
nAnenak-kiLambiyE jnAnattai maraittiDum naccu manadai unadiccaiyil aDakkiyE
    caraNam 2    sattiya vAkkuDan sAdhukkaL Adaravum samarasa nilai perum sanmArga sAdhanamum
shuddha parama yOga siddhiyum adhyAtma sutantra vAzhkkaiyum hitamuDan udaviyE
